com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler

Class WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerFactory

    public class WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements HandlerFactory
    HandlerFactory implementation that creates WSPHandlers in one chain. The factory is dynamic. If a factory is added or removed any handler chain created by this factory will be updated to reflect the change.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void clear()
      Breaks the association between this factory and the MessageHandler created by the factory.
      MessageHandler create(HandlerContext context, HandlerRole role)
      Creates a WSPHandler that will implement or enforce ws-policies for messages with the given context.
      void setEffectivePolicyFactory(EffectivePolicyFactory factory)
      Configures the effective policy factory used to determine the effective policy that will dictate the handlers created.
      void setFactory(WSPHandlerChainFactory factory) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory

        public WsdlWSPHandlerChainFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • setFactory

        public void setFactory(WSPHandlerChainFactory factory)

      • setEffectivePolicyFactory

        public void setEffectivePolicyFactory(EffectivePolicyFactory factory)
        Configures the effective policy factory used to determine the effective policy that will dictate the handlers created.
        Parameters:
        factory - EffectivePolicyFactory to use.

      • create

        public MessageHandler create(HandlerContext context,
                             HandlerRole role)
                      throws GException
        Creates a WSPHandler that will implement or enforce ws-policies for messages with the given context.
        Specified by:
        create in interface HandlerFactory
        Parameters:
        context - HandlerContext providing the context around how the handler will be used. The context passed in must be a WSDLHandlerContext implementation.
        role - HandlerRole in which the handler will act.
        Returns:
        MessageHandler implementation, or null if a MessageHandler is not needed based on the context provided.
        Throws:
        GException - Thrown if an error was encountered trying to create the handler.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Breaks the association between this factory and the MessageHandler created by the factory. This will cause the handler to no longer be updated.
